AI overviews might be reducing traffic following a query, but i strongly suspect the main effect here is a reduction in search queries generally as users increasingly ask their questions to LLMs. It's not just fewer clickthroughs into search results: it's an overall reduction in search queries.

reply_context.text:
"Worldwide search traffic has fallen by 15% in the past year, estimates Similarweb, a digital intelligence platform. The culprit: AI search." www.cjr.org/analysis/tra... 

Why does this matter? Lighter traffic to news sites means less ad revenue and fewer chances to convert readers into subscribers.
